Name: G-MODEアーカイブス+ 探偵・癸生川凌介事件譚 Vol.6「対交錯事件」
About the game: The sixth installment of 'The Detective Kibukawa Ryosuke Case Tale' series! A serial murder case and the disappearance of a female secretary. Uncover the hidden truth from two intersecting perspectives. 【Game System】 This is a mystery adventure game in which the player solves a series of difficult cases that occur in a fictional town called Marihama City in K Prefecture. The player controls the main character in the scenario and solves the mystery by selecting commands in the conversation and deduction parts, and by gathering information and evidence that will provide clues to solving the case. The story progresses by command selection, so even beginners can easily play the game. 【Story】 This case is a series of murders that have been occurring in and around Marihama-dai. The victims are not connected to each other, and Detective Otonari, who sees that the situation is grave and has no clue how to solve it, requests you to help him solve the case. The story begins with the assistant detective, Izuna Sagishima, who is working with the police to investigate the case. Meanwhile, a detective agency is forced to do a half-assed job on the detective's behalf. Masao Ikurumi, a scenario writer, is asked by a company to search for a person. The woman he was investigating, Yumiko Hamakawa, was a contract employee working in the secretarial department. After a month of work, she suddenly disappeared... Izuna and Ikurumi. They encounter two incidents. What is the truth that awaits them at the end of it all?
